property.name: max_tokens
property.label: max_tokens
property.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate in the chat completion. The total length of input tokens and generated tokens is limited by the model's context length.

property.name: temperature
property.label: temperature
property.description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

property.name: engine
property.label: ChatGPT Model version
property.description: The GPT engine model to run this query towards
